author: Dan Hanzus
description: Cleveland has options at quarterback, no one denies that. Browns have Cody Kessler, DeShone Kizer and Brock Osweiler. But what they really need is a solution. And I have an idea. Sign Kevin Love.
title: Kevin Love an intriguing Browns quarterback option

author: Dave McMenaminESPN Staff Writer
description: Kevin Love's 32-point, 12-rebound outburst against Boston in Game 1 of the East finals was exactly what the Cavaliers wanted to see.
title: LeBron James says Cavaliers love seeing 'Kevin from Minnesota'
